short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Protect your bookmark privacy and control whether browsing history is generated.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Bookmark Keeper, the ultimate Chrome extension designed to safeguard your online privacy. With Bookmark Keeper, you can discreetly store and manage your confidential websites, keeping them hidden from prying eyes in a secure bookmark bar. Here's a breakdown of its key features:
1.Secure and Hidden Bookmarks:
 - Effortlessly collect and hide your confidential websites within the Bookmark Keeper bookmark bar.
 - Ensure that your private online collection remains discreet and secure, away from the regular bookmark bar.
2.Customized Folder Structure:
 - Tailor your bookmark organization by creating personalized folder structures.
 - Easily categorize and manage your private bookmarks to suit your preferences and organizational needs.
3.Automated Browsing History Deletion:
 - Activate the automatic browser history deletion feature to maintain your privacy.
 - Set a time frame, and Bookmark Keeper will automatically erase your browsing history within that period, ensuring that your search activities during that time leave no traces behind.
4.Password Encryption:
 - Enhance the security of your private bookmarks by encrypting them with a password.
 - Only you will have access to your confidential websites, adding an extra layer of protection to your online sanctuary.
Experience a new level of online privacy and organization with Bookmark Keeper. Your secrets stay safe, your bookmarks stay organized, and your browsing history remains your own. Download now to take control of your private web experience!
